verses.english: The angel Gabriel was sent from God to a city of Galilee named Nazareth.
verses.latin: Missus est angelus Gabriel a Deo in civitatem Galilaeae, cui nomen Nazareth.

verses.english: Elizabeth was filled with the Holy Spirit and exclaimed, 'Blessed are you among women!'
verses.latin: Repleta est Spiritu Sancto Elisabeth et exclamavit dicens: Benedicta tu inter mulieres!

verses.english: She gave birth to her firstborn son and laid him in a manger.
verses.latin: Et peperit filium suum primogenitum et reclinavit eum in praesepio.

verses.english: They brought him up to Jerusalem to present him to the Lord.
verses.latin: Tulerunt illum in Jerusalem, ut sisterent eum Domino.

verses.english: They found him in the temple, sitting among the teachers.
verses.latin: Invenerunt illum in templo sedentem in medio doctorum.

verses.english: He prayed, 'Father, if you are willing, remove this cup from me.'
verses.latin: Pater, si vis, transfer calicem istum a me.

verses.english: Then Pilate took Jesus and had him scourged.
verses.latin: Tunc apprehendit Pilatus Iesum et flagellavit.

verses.english: They clothed him in a purple cloak and put a crown of thorns on his head.
verses.latin: Et circumponentes coronam spineam imposuerunt capiti eius.

verses.english: He went out, bearing his own cross.
verses.latin: Et bajulans sibi crucem exivit.

verses.english: And they crucified him.
verses.latin: Et crucifixerunt eum.

verses.english: He is not here; he has risen!
verses.latin: Non est hic; surrexit enim.

verses.english: He was taken up into heaven and sat at the right hand of God.
verses.latin: Assumptus est in caelum, et sedit a dextris Dei.

mysteries.title: The Descent of the Holy Spirit

verses.english: They were all filled with the Holy Spirit.
verses.latin: Et repleti sunt omnes Spiritu Sancto.

verses.english: A great sign appeared in heaven: a woman clothed with the sun.
verses.latin: Signum magnum apparuit in caelo: mulier amicta sole.

verses.english: She is crowned Queen of Heaven and Earth.
verses.latin: Et coronata est regina caeli et terrae.

verses.english: This is my beloved Son, with whom I am well pleased.
verses.latin: Hic est Filius meus dilectus, in quo mihi complacui.

verses.english: Do whatever he tells you.
verses.latin: Quodcumque dixerit vobis, facite.

verses.english: Repent and believe in the Gospel.
verses.latin: Poenitemini et credite evangelio.

verses.english: His face shone like the sun, and his clothes became white as light.
verses.latin: Resplenduit facies eius sicut sol, vestimenta autem eius facta sunt alba sicut nix.

verses.english: This is my body, which is given for you.
verses.latin: Hoc est corpus meum, quod pro vobis tradetur.
